snippet: For the past four months, Charlie Beljan has been known for the panic attack he weathered on the way to winning the 2012 PGA Tour finale outside Orlando. After his four-under-par 67 at Riviera Country Club on Thursday, he hopes the focus will shift...
abstract: For the past four months, Charlie Beljan has been known for the panic attack he weathered on the way to winning the 2012 PGA Tour finale outside Orlando. After his four-under-par 67 at Riviera Country Club on Thursday, he hopes the focus will shift to his golf.

headline.main: Beljan Turns Heads With His Play
